alert.note: Alert for Gila; Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 26 at 10:33PM MST until July 26 at 11:15PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Gila County in east central Arizona... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... * Until 1115 PM MST. * At 1033 PM MST, severe thunderstorm winds were located along a line extending from near Peoria to 6 miles north of Desert Ridge Marketplace to Round Valley, moving northwest at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Scottsdale, Peoria, Surprise, El Mirage, New River, Sycamore Creek, Sun City West, Waddell, Ballantine Trailhead, Circle City, Round Valley, Wittmann, Sunflower, Sun City, and Cave Creek. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 223 and 241. US Highway 60 between mile markers 120 and 145. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 210 and 226. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Wind damage with these storms will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. SEEK SHELTER IMMEDIATELY inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
